body:
I'll give anybody some constructive criticism for anything.
Just say what it's about.
body_tagged:

Just say what it's about.
title: The Constructive Criticism Thread

replies.body: Just anything MC related, not just maps.
replies.body_tagged: Just anything MC related, not just maps.

replies.body: You will see me a lot on this thread
replies.body_tagged: You will see me a lot on this thread

replies.body:
Why do you have to be so vague in this post? It's not like you have given us something to actually discuss.

^^^^^
now that there is constructive criticism for you TNTTurtles

reply_to.body: That no sence thread copy from ocn doe
reply_to.body_tagged: That no sence thread copy from ocn doe

replies.body: Review our map development process? Try to be civil though... expecting a lot of negatives :P
replies.body_tagged: Review our map development process? Try to be civil though... expecting a lot of negatives :P

replies.body:
Test maps a bit in private, it helps considering all public matches are usually crappy.
Don't change old maps, they are old for a reason, editing them just makes it new, not to mention most of the edits don't even relate to the old version(eg: Rapture)
Don't stick the god damn monument right next to spawn, it's lazy at best and stalematey at worse.
Stick to red and blue team colors.
Focus on the god damn gameplay instead of aesthetics.

Staff applications.

What makes them better or worse than OCN's selection process.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
They are both equal IMO
OCN has slower selection  but usually better mods.
Avicus has faster selection but not as good mods.
